casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Norman Wayne JONES. No. 591PA03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 10, 2004. Daniel P. O'Brien, Lisa Granberry Corbett, Assistant Attorney Generals, Bill Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, John Carriker, District Attorneys, for State. Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Jones. Daniel Shatz, Wilmington, for Sneed. Marshall Hurley, Mary Price, for Families Against Mandatory Min. Charles E. Daye, Legal Affairs Vice President, Paul M. Green, Durham, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers.

ORDER

Pursuant to Rule 30(b) of the North Carolina Rules of Appellate Procedure, the oral arguments in the above captioned case and State v. Corey Tyrone Sneed, 601PA03, are hereby consolidated. The State shall have a total of thirty minutes to present oral argument and the defendants shall have a total of thirty minutes to present oral argument. By order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of February 2004.
